lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A way to say farewell when parting ways.

items.explanation_en: This question asks for the current time.

items.en: Do you have any plans for today?
items.explanation_en: This asks if someone has activities scheduled for the day.

items.en: I hope you are doing well.
items.explanation_en: This expresses a wish for someone's good health.

items.en: What did you do last weekend?
items.target: ¿Qué hiciste el fin de semana pasado?
items.explanation_en: This inquires about activities from the previous weekend.
This asks if someone is having a good time during their vacation.

items.en: I look forward to seeing you soon.
items.explanation_en: This expresses anticipation for a future meeting.

items.en: What are you doing this weekend?
items.target: ¿Qué vas a hacer este fin de semana?
items.explanation_en: This asks about plans for the upcoming weekend.

items.en: It's been a while since we last met.
items.target: Ha pasado un tiempo desde la última vez que nos vimos.
items.explanation_en: This acknowledges the time since the last meeting.

items.en: Are you ready for the meeting?
items.explanation_en: This asks if someone is prepared for an upcoming meeting.

items.en: I hope you had a good trip.
items.target: Espero que tuviste un buen viaje.
items.explanation_en: This expresses hope that someone enjoyed their recent travel.
